title: Nature Animals Pets Instants
creator: Cool App Top & Best Arcade Game hot brain fun free

extendedInfo.description: Nature and Animal Buttons is an application of buttons with various animal sounds and elements of nature. It's a fast fun and guaranteed to enjoy with friends, family, children everywhere! There are 100 nature sounds! Bee, donkey, goat, dog, horse, coyote, owl, crow, dinosaur, elephant seals, gulls, hen, rooster, goose, cat, hawk, dolphin, cricket, hyena, lion, wolf, monkey, fly, sheep, panther, parrot, bird, duck, turkey, woodpecker, pigeon, pig, rat, frog, tiger, cow, running water, bubbles, waterfall, rain forest, thunder, vente, among others.We are open to suggestions for new sounds! Leave in the comments or send us email or twitt.[Features] =============================================== =================1 - Play / Pause button on a click sound.2 - Button sound random.3 - Place the sound to repeat (including random).4 - Set as alarm or notification sound android.5 - Share sound (Email, MMS, Bluetooth, Whatsup, AllShare, and other apps that support it)6 - Insert / Remove buttons sound of favorites.7 - View favorite buttons8 - Hide / Show buttons sound.9 - Show hidden buttons10 - Contact: Leave suggestions, vote on existing suggestions, participate in surveys about app, report an error ...================================================== =============================Use the Contact Us within the application!Leave your note and comment on Google Play.Criticisms, suggestions, new sounds to add, please contact us:On twitter: https://twitter.com/catbagmobileEmail: catbagmobile@gmail.comOr leave us a comment.THANK YOU for your support!Explanation of permissions:WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE -> To share and install the application on SD CardWRITE_SETTINGS -> To change the ringtones and notificationsINTERNET ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE -> Banner Advertising AdMob (http://www.google.com/ads/admob/)GET_ACCOUNTS -> For third-party feedback tool
